home_main_title:
Hi, I am Samuel Belo.
Fullstack Developer
about_resume_presentation_1:
In 2016 I graduated in Business Administration from PUC-PR and was working in a relatively stable job, however, I didn't feel professionally fulfilled, and to be honest, I didn't like my job at all.
Around 2019 I started to research other areas where I could fit in better and give myself the feeling of professional fulfillment I was looking for so much, that's when I saw in programming an opportunity to change careers.
I've always been a very technical person, I really like to 'tweak' things, and use lines of code to solve problems and be able to do this not only as a hobby but also as a job and build a career on top of it, that's what attracted me to the world of systems development.
I started my studies on my own through online courses, and in July 2021 I got my first job as a developer.
about_resume_presentation_2:
I've been working as a full-stack developer for a little over a year and I'm, again, at the beginning of my professional journey, but the difference is that now I work with something that makes me happy.
For now, I'll keep moving forward, always looking for continuous improvement.
about_resume_job_1_description: Job description: Software development for internal management solutions, using primarily Laravel with PostgreSQL, and NodeJs for specific functionality.
about_resume_job_2_company: Company: TI360 Soluções em tecnologia da informação e telecomunicações
about_resume_job_2_description: Job description: Software development for other companies, using Laravel and Angular as frameworks and MySQL for the database.
contact_sub_title: If you're interested in job, contact-me
